blogPost.title: Do women carry a disproportionate load in family life and care? Answer by @alyssawestring, author of Parents Who Lead. https://t.co/y9xtjtZdA1 https://t.co/oKwQFsTe4E
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 家庭生活や介護において、女性は不均衡な負担を強いられているのでしょうか？Parents Who Lead』の著者、@alyssawestringさんの回答です。https://t.co/y9xtjtZdA1 https://t.co/oKwQFsTe4E
妇女在家庭生活和照顾方面的负担是否过重？回答者：@alyssawestring, Parents Who Lead的作者。https://t.co/y9xtjtZdA1 https://t.co/oKwQFsTe4E
婦女在家庭生活和照顧方面的負擔是否過重？回答者：@alyssawestring, Parents Who Lead的作者。https://t.co/y9xtjtZdA1 https://t.co/oKwQFsTe4E
